authorization_step.title: List for Rent
authorization_step.notice_line_one: Before listing your {assetType} for rent you will need to approve the {link} contract so it can operate your {assetType}, exactly like when selling your {assetType}.

rentals_promotional_modal.title: Announcing LAND rentals
rentals_promotional_modal.description:
If you are a LAND owner you can now earn MANA by renting your parcels or estates to content creators.

Are you a content creator? Now you can publish your builds to Genesis City without the need of owning LAND.

If you want to learn more, read our blog post.
